examples: She was convinced that sooner or later she would fulfil her destiny. The time was right for him to meet his destiny.
No man can escape his destiny.
Something was about to happen that would shape her destiny.
the destiny that awaited him Her destiny lay in that city.

words: be in control of your own destiny/be master of your own destiny
examples: She set up her own business because she wanted to be in control of her own destiny.
He was driven on by a strong sense of destiny.
